channel.title: Admin _____ has logged in?
channel.description:
ive got a pimpscape source and if got the basic idea of what the code will be but it keeps giving me errors that have nothing to do with it.. heres the code im thinking i would have to add
[code] if(playerrights >=2) playerhandler.messagetoall= "administrator playername+ has logged in! there are now There is now "+PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount() + " players online."; [/code]
any idea what ive done wrong?

item.title: Admin _____ has logged in?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

calm down sleep the way hes trying to do it is trying to messagetoall method which does what it says the sendmessage will only message it to that person

Read full topic

item.title: Admin _____ has logged in?
item.dc:creator: @Sleep Sleep
item.description:
@Sleep wrote:

Palidino76:

blitz ya that will work just fine

Are you retarded? It will not work. It just has playerRights == 2. Then it’s not within playerRights so it won’t be called upon. It’ll need to look like this…

if(playerRights == 2) {
sendMessage(“This is how you call a method”);
}

Read full topic

[/code]
